body: Yo, you know why all this shit happened? Cause the teacher never stopped loving Jun even when Kazuya proposed to her and she seemingly accepted it. But in reality she didn't and all this happened.
Fuck you kazuya , the one who broke other happiness
Someone knows the ntr where boy takes the girl back after mind break.

I did not fully understand the ending, (it could be due to the bad translation of some dialogues).  But could someone explain the ending to me?  Did the girl still have a thing for Kazuya or were they nothing?  I was confused by the way I speak to him at the end of the Doujin, he spoke to her as if he was still fucking her, did they still have something or not?  Someone who would be so kind to clarify these doubts ???
JUN the man, best NTR MC right there.
Damn...was told Jun was the only smart MC in NTR history...lol Not. Idiot went right back for more. Fucking retard...

Man I loved it's hentai series.

PS: Well not series but episode
